The claims of freedom in Turkey are a perception operation altogether.
In Turkey, there is no "freedom of the press" look at how the reaction of the Council of State is reflected in the headlines.
Those who cut off on freedom of press abroad in Turkey will swallow small tongues when they see the headlines.
In any country you will not see governments over the headlines that the governments are so irresponsible, out of place, unlawful.
